kalao.fli.camera module#

camera.py is part of the KalAO Instrument Control Software (KalAO-ICS).

kalao.fli.camera.increment_image_counter()#

Increments the image counter by one

Returns:

new image counter value

kalao.fli.camera.initialise()#
kalao.fli.camera.log(req)#
kalao.fli.camera.log_last_image_path(fli_image_path)#
kalao.fli.camera.log_temporary_image_path(fli_image_path)#
kalao.fli.camera.set_temperature(temperature)#
kalao.fli.camera.take_image(dit=0.05, filepath=None, sequencer_arguments=None)#
Parameters:

  • dit – Detector integration time to use

  • filepath – Path where the file should be stored

Returns:

path to the image
